float slide(float x, float p, float s) { // reparameterize x to slide location p (by steps s)
    p /= s;
    return x - clamp(x - s*floor(p)          ,0.,s)                    // steps
             - clamp(x - s* ceil(p)          ,0.,s)
             + clamp(x - s*(ceil(p)-fract(p)),0.,s);                   // continuous offset
}

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    vec2  R = iResolution.xy,
          U = ( 2.*u - R ) / R.y;                                      // normalized coordinates
             
 // U = u/R; O = vec4( U.y < slide(U.x, iMouse.x/R.x,1./8.) ); return; // test
    
    float s = .393,                                                    // pi/8.
          t = fract(iTime/5.),                                         // time
          l = length(U), a = mod( atan(U.y,U.x) - s*t, 6.28 ),         // polar coordinates + time rotation
          b = slide( a +s/2. , 2.35+ 3.14*t , s ) - s/2.;              // slide one angle over time
    U = l * cos(  mod(b+.2,s) -.2  + vec2(0,11));                      // 16-folds angular symmetry
    O = vec4( abs(a-3.9) < 1.8                                         // along half ring
                ?   smoothstep(3./R.y,0.,length(U-vec2(.8,0))-.08)     // draw disks 
                  * .5*sin(1e2*t) + .5                                 //   with flashing color
                : .5 );                                                // background
}
